name: smsshcss
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/utils/index.ts --format cjs,esm --tsconfig tsconfig.json && cp src/styles/reset.css dist/ && cp src/styles/base.css dist/ && cp src/utils/index.d.ts dist/utils/
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts src/utils/index.ts --format cjs,esm --watch --tsconfig tsconfig.json && cp src/styles/reset.css dist/ && cp src/styles/base.css dist/ && cp src/utils/index.d.ts dist/utils/
scripts.analyze:css: node -e "const { devHelpers } = require('./dist/utils/index.js'); console.log('CSS Analysis Tools Available:', Object.keys(devHelpers));"
scripts.debug:classes: node -e "const { generateCSS } = require('./dist/index.js'); const config = require('./smsshcss.config.js'); generateCSS({...config, development: true}).then(css => console.log('Generated CSS length:', css.length));"
scripts.check:duplicates: node -e "const { devHelpers } = require('./dist/utils/index.js'); const { generateCSS } = require('./dist/index.js'); const config = require('./smsshcss.config.js'); generateCSS(config).then(css => { const dups = devHelpers.findDuplicateSelectors(css); console.log('Duplicate selectors:', dups.length ? dups : 'None found'); });"
scripts.size:report: node -e "const { generatePurgeReport } = require('./dist/index.js'); const config = require('./smsshcss.config.js'); generatePurgeReport(config).then(report => report && console.log('CSS Size Report:', JSON.stringify(report, null, 2)));"
